Uses of Interface
popt4jlib.OptimizerIntf

  • Packages that use OptimizerIntf 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib
    popt4jlib: a parallel optimization library for Java.
    popt4jlib.BH
    Generalized Adaptive Basin Hopping
    popt4jlib.DE
    Differential Evolution Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.EA
    Evolutionary Algorithms Parallel Implementation
    popt4jlib.GA
    Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent
    Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent.stochastic
    Stochastic Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for (deterministic or stochastic) real vector function optimization).
    popt4jlib.LocalSearch
    Local Search algorithms parallel implementation for combinatorial optimization problems.
    popt4jlib.MonteCarlo
    Monte-Carlo Search Parallel Implementation (aka random search)
    popt4jlib.neural
    Neural Network Related Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.PS
    Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.PS.FA
    Firefly Algorithm Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.SA
    Simulated Annealing Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    tests
    tests package: defines functions used for testing the optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib library.
    tests.sic.rnqt.nbin
    tests.sic.rnqt.nbin package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (R,nQ,T) facing stochastic demands that are distributed according to the Negative Binomial distribution (a compound Poisson distribution where customers arrive at intervals that are spaced according to the Poisson distribution, but their order quantities are logarithmically distributed instead of being always single unit demands) in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
    tests.sic.rnqt.norm
    tests.sic.rnqt.norm package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (R,nQ,T) facing normally distributed demands in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
    tests.sic.sST.det
    tests.sic.sST.det package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run exact average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (R,nQ,T) facing deterministic demands with constant demand rate, in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
    tests.sic.sST.poisson
    tests.sic.sST.poisson package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (s,S,T) facing Poisson distributed demands in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib

      Subinterfaces of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ConstrainedOptimizerIntf
      the interface every optimizer (for constrained optimization) must implement.
      interface  LocalOptimizerIntf
      interface for local-optimization methods (methods seeking a local minimum in the neighborhood of a "starting point" solution).

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.BH

      Classes in popt4jlib.BH that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DGABH
      A parallel/distributed implementation of the Generalized Adaptive Basin Hopping algorithm, using an island-model of computation, where multiple populations are evolved in separate "islands", exchanging individuals in the same migration model as in DGA and DPSO classes.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.DE

      Classes in popt4jlib.DE that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DDE
      A parallel/distributed implementation of the Differential Evolution algorithm.
      class  DDE2
      A parallel/distributed implementation of the Differential Evolution algorithm.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.EA

      Classes in popt4jlib.EA that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DEA
      A class implementing the Evolutionary Algorithm paradigm for function optimization.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.GA

      Classes in popt4jlib.GA that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DGA
      The DGA class implements a thread-safe parallel Distributed Genetic Algorithm that follows the island-model of GA computation, with an elitist selection strategy that uses roulette-wheel selection of individuals based on their fitness (that is computed every generation).

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.GradientDescent

      Classes in popt4jlib.GradientDescent that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AcceleratedGradientDescent
      Accelerated Gradient Descent method using the notion of "momentum" to avoid oscillations that plague steepest descent after the initial stage.
      class  AlternatingVariablesDescent
      Alternating Variables Optimization: the class implements a method suitable for the (box-constrained) local-optimization of functions in R^n where some or all of the function variables are constrained to assume values from a discrete set (eg when some variables must take on integer values only, or when some variables must take on values that are an integer multiple of some quantity).
      class  ArmijoBFGS
      Quasi-Newton optimization using BFGS for inverse Hessian updates and Armijo rule for step-size determination.
      class  ArmijoSteepestDescent
      Steepest Descent using Armijo rule for step-size determination.
      class  ArmijoSteepestDescentST
      Single-Threaded version of the ArmijoSteepestDescent class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.
      class  FletcherConjugateGradient
      Implementation of the Conjugate-Gradient method for nonlinear optimization, using the Fletcher-Reeves formula for updating the b parameter, and the Al-Baali - Fletcher bracketing & sectioning method for step-size determination.
      class  FletcherConjugateGradientST
      Single-Threaded version of the FletcherConjugateGradient class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.
      class  PolakRibiereConjugateGradient
      class that implements the Conjugate-Gradient method for (unconstrained) nonlinear optimization using the Polak-Ribiere formula for updating b, and the Armijo rule for step-size determination.
      class  PolakRibiereConjugateGradientST
      Single-Threaded version of the PolakRibiereConjugateGradient class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.
      class  RandomDescents
      class implementing a "questionable" method of attempting multiple descent directions (in parallel) from the same iterate point, and greedily choosing the best one using the Armijo rule for step-size determination.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.GradientDescent.stochastic

      Classes in popt4jlib.GradientDescent.stochastic that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Adam
      A multi-threaded implementation of the Adam algorithm for stochastic optimization.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.LocalSearch

      Classes in popt4jlib.LocalSearch that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DLS
      class implements a parallel LocalSearch method for combinatorial optimization problems, obeying the popt4jlib.LocalOptimizerIntf contract.
      class  DLSM
      class implements a parallel LocalSearch method for combinatorial optimization problems, obeying the popt4jlib.LocalOptimizerIntf contract.
      class  IdentitySearchOptimizer
      class implements a no-search local search that always returns the argument passed to it, along with its evaluation result.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.MonteCarlo

      Classes in popt4jlib.MonteCarlo that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MCS
      A parallel implementation of a Monte-Carlo Simulation-inspired random search of the function domain space.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.neural

      Classes in popt4jlib.neural that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Adam4FFNN
      same as popt4jlib.GradientDescent.stochastic.Adam but with the added hard-wired knowledge of mini-batch training, so that when computing derivatives, it actually maintains the same mini-batch in each derivative evaluation.
      class  PDMiniBatchBackPropagation
      implements a parallel/distributed version of the mini-batch Back Propagation classical algorithm for neural network training (BackProp here means not just the automatic differentiation of the feed-forward neural network, but the stochastic gradient descent with fixed step-size as well).
      class  SGD4FFNN
      same as popt4jlib.GradientDescent.stochastic.SGD but with the added hard-wired knowledge of mini-batch training, so that when computing derivatives, it actually maintains the same mini-batch in each derivative evaluation.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.PS

      Classes in popt4jlib.PS that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DPSO
      A parallel implementation of the Particle Swarm Optimization algorithm for function optimization, implementing also the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf objects by extending the GLockingObservableObserverBase class, so that it may be combined with other optimization processes and produce better results.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.PS.FA

      Classes in popt4jlib.PS.FA that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DFA
      A parallel implementation of the Firefly Algorithm for function optimization, implementing also the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf objects by extending GLockingObservableObserverBase so that it may be combined with other optimization processes and produce better results.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in popt4jlib.SA

      Classes in popt4jlib.SA that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DSA
      The DSA class implements a parallel Simulated Annealing algorithm for the minimization of a function to be passed in as argument object implementing the FunctionIntf argument of the minimize(f) method.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in tests

      Fields in tests declared as OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private OptimizerIntf OptThread._opt 
      Constructors in tests with parameters of type OptimizerIntf 
      Constructor and Description
      OptThread(OptimizerIntf opt, FunctionIntf f) 

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in tests.sic.rnqt.nbin

      Classes in tests.sic.rnqt.nbin that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RnQTCnbinFixedTOpt
      class implements an optimizer over the first two variables of the (R,nQ,T) policy, namely the reorder point R and the batch size Q variables, for given (fixed) review period T.
      class  RnQTCnbinOpt
      class implements an optimizer over ALL three variables of the (R,nQ,T) policy, namely the reorder point R, the batch size Q and the review period T.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in tests.sic.rnqt.norm

      Classes in tests.sic.rnqt.norm that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RnQTCnormFixedTOpt
      class implements an optimizer over the first two variables of the (R,nQ,T) policy, namely the reorder point R and the batch size Q variables, for given (fixed) review period T.
      class  RnQTCnormOpt
      class implements an optimizer over ALL three variables of the (R,nQ,T) policy, namely the reorder point R, the batch size Q and the review period T.

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in tests.sic.sST.det

      Classes in tests.sic.sST.det that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  sSTCdetFixedTOpt
      optimizer class that computes the exact optimal cost for a single-echelon inventory system facing deterministic demand with known and constant demand rate, under a periodic review policy (s,S,T).

    • Uses of OptimizerIntf in tests.sic.sST.poisson

      Classes in tests.sic.sST.poisson that implement OptimizerIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  sSTCpoissonFixedTOpt
      class implements an optimizer over the first two variables of the (s,S,T) policy, namely the reorder point s and the order-up-to S variables, for given (fixed) review period T.
      class  sSTCpoissonOpt
      class implements an optimizer over ALL three variables of the (s,S,T) policy, namely the reorder point s, the order-up-to point S and the review period T.
